body.p:
To His Excellency Beriah Magoffin
Govenor of Kentucky

We the undersigned citizens of Caldwell county and Jurors who set upon the trial of the commonwealth against John Dunn on a charge of disturbing religious worship and of which offense he was found Guilty and fined the sum of Dollars and five days imprisonment Humbly Petition your Excelency to remit that portion of the Judgement which requires said Dunn to be imprisoned we state that said Dunn is a young man of good character and that the offence of which he was convicted was coerced by intemperance at the time a fault which he has now discarded, he has taken an appeal from said Judgement in order to obtain the Executive aid to save him and his friends who are reputable from the mortification of confinement in Jail
hoping that your Excellency will relieve this youth from the penalty of Jail confinement we are msot respectfully Yours &c

B. J Mason A. Jurer
